step_overview.goal: To safely retire and dispose of the (sub)system under consideration.

tasks.name: Complete Environmental Management System Planning
tasks.description: GPT will provide users with a 'to-do-list' based on environmental management standards. Then GPT will guide users through the list and assist them in filling in the details.

completeness.description: mention which items in the provided to-do list are mentioned in the knowledge base. and which are not.

presentation.description: Organize information in a clear, structured manner

to_do_list.task: Plan actions to address significant environmental aspects
subtasks: Identify the significant environmental impacts that the organization and the products have during reuse, recycling, and disposal

to_do_list.task: Plan actions to address compliance obligations
subtasks: The big task is to review and list all applicable compliance obligations. Users need to do this step carefully and completely.

to_do_list.task: Plan actions to address identified risks and opportunities
subtasks: Develop action plans to mitigate risks and capitalize on opportunities. Consider information at 'considerations'.

to_do_list.task: Plan integration of actions into EMS processes
subtasks: Identify and consider the following aspects while planning integration:
a) What specific actions will be taken to integrate environmental management into existing processes
b) What resources (financial, human, technological) will be required for successful integration
c) Who will be responsible for overseeing and implementing the integration process
d) When each phase of the integration will be completed, including key milestones and deadlines
e) How the results of the integration will be evaluated, including:
- Defining indicators for monitoring progress towards measurable environmental objectives
- Establishing methods for data collection and analysis
- Setting up regular review processes to assess effectiveness and make adjustments
Establish criteria for measuring effectiveness of actions
Develop a schedule for reviewing and evaluating actions
Create a feedback mechanism for continuous improvement

considerations.category: Within the environment of the system

examples: Possible reuse of subsystems or parts
Knowledge, information or data related to disposal
Lessons learned from previous product end-of-life cycles
Historical data on material degradation and longevity
Potential future environmental considerations and impacts
Anticipated changes in recycling technologies and regulations
